fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Sport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Advocating for women's rights and gender equality. Supporting and organizing initiatives and campaigns aiming at reinforcing gender equality at European and national level.  
Promoting European values in education and culture.
relevant_communication:
European Women Alliance promotes and organizes the event Women's European Council (WEUCO), involving Meps, European Commissionaires, national representatives of turning Presidency of the Council of the EU and civil society's organisations in order to discuss European Council's agenda with a gender perspective.  
The objective pursued by this initiative are: reinforcing women's participation in political process and calling the institutions to consider gender equality among the priorities of the European political agenda.
